Bash(git commit -m "Fix bot name puns in image responses and update art style

Changes:
- modules/ai_handler.py: Add stronger warnings against using name parts as adjectives
- Prevent bot from saying things like ""fierce fish-lion"" when name contains ""fish""
- config.json: Change style from childlike to modern digital illustration
- modules/image_generator.py: Update default style prefix
- CLAUDE.md: Document new art style

Art Style Changed:
- Before: Kindergarten art style, childlike drawings
- After: Digital illustration, clean lines, vibrant colors, modern art style

Prevents:
- Bot using parts of its name as adjectives (""fishy"", ""fierce fish-lion"")
- Childlike/cartoon aesthetic when user wants normal drawings")

Bash(git commit -m "Change art style to hand-drawn sketch instead of vector art

Changes:
- config.json: Update style_prefix to hand-drawn sketch style
- modules/image_generator.py: Update default style to traditional art
- CLAUDE.md: Document hand-drawn sketch style

Art Style Changed:
- Before: Digital illustration, clean lines, vibrant colors (vector look)
- After: Hand-drawn sketch, pencil drawing style, artistic shading, traditional art

Result:
- Drawings will look like real pencil/pen sketches
- Natural sketch lines instead of perfect vector paths
- Artistic shading for depth and texture
- Traditional art aesthetic instead of digital graphics")
